mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM t_permission p WHERE exists( select a.id from t_role_permission a join t_role b on a.role_id = b.id join t_user_role c on c.role_id = b.id join t_user d on d.id = c.user_id where p.id = a.permission_id AND d.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and p.del_flag = 0 order by p.sort_no ASC
